name: Energy Bop
description:
NOTE: LOL I FORGOT TO TELL YOU IN GAME -- use S for up and K for down

You play a busy student whose energy is critically dropping all the time. Grab energy treats and smash enemies to get through the day!

  • This was for the GoGodot2 Jam, theme was "Energy Source"
  • Did not entirely include all the features I wanted, but that is ok :)
  • All art, code and music is my own. 
  • Time spent: ~48 hrs
